1�A rolled-up piece of parchment is inside the jar.
1�Unfurl the parchment?Yes.No.
1�The parchment is an elemental correlation chart.Perhaps it has something to do with this facility...?
1�Oh, it's you.Have you finished your task?
1�A much easier battle than you expected, yes?
1�Fortunately for you, I had cast an additional seal upon the creature.
1�However, that task was merely a secondary objective.If my information is correct, our goal lies beyond this point...
1�I see.I did not expect such incompetence.
1�Even after I had cast an additional seal upon the creature...
1�No matter.That was merely a secondary objective.If my information is correct, our goal lies beyond this point...
1�So this is the precious vessel...
1�But what is such an important object doing in a place like this?
1�In any case, it should prove to be a valuable asset.
1�My only problem is that the circumstances have changed this time.
1�What is this?You came here looking for me?
1�Very well.Let us return to the safehold...
1�This chamber...
1�You're the adventurrrer who was with Prishe.
1�Who are you supposed to be?
1�Maybe you rrremember me?I am a Mithran sin hunter.
1�My orders come from beyond the southern seas, dirrrectly from the Mithran homeland.
1�I am a Mithran sin hunter.I have been authorrrized to sink my fangs into anyone dumb enough to get in the way of my duty.
1�After hearing the news that a town of Tavnazian survivorrrs had been discovered, I was ordered to hike my tail over herrre.
1�My orrriginal task was to see if Cardinal Mildaurion was holed up somewhere in the Tavnazian Safehold...
1�I thought that Cardinal Mildaurion might have holed up in one of these rooms...
1�But things have changed.Without letting on to Prishe or Ulmia, I started investigating the mysteries connected to the cathedral.
1�Looks like my instincts were on holiday this time, huh?
1�Mysteries like this weapon case...
1�But then I found this weapon case...
1�It's empty.What could they have been hiding in herrre, I wonder.
1�Frrrom the size of it, I'm guessing...a greatsword?
1�I don't suppose you've got any hints for me?
1�Whatever it was, it looks like it was rrremoved a long time ago. Maybe in the time of the war?
1�Hmmm, there're no other clues lying arrround...Guess I'll have to give up for the moment, and go see what other stories Odeya has floating around in that old head of herrrs.
1�Have you finished?It is done.Not yet.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Distant Beliefs(pt.1).Distant Beliefs(pt.2).X Marks the Spot.Knocking on Forbidden Doors.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Well, well, well, what have we here? Long has it been since I had any visitors...of this world.
1�None other. My name is Fardimant X Boncourge, heir to the House of Boncourge, or what remains of it...
1�Ho ho...?I sense a hint of familiarity between you and me, Sir...
1�Sir Enaremand. Yes...There is an air about you that does not quite fit in this plane of existence...
1�But that is of no matter.
1�May I inquire what has brought you to my stygian abode?

1�The feelings you harbor for your fianc?ie are so great, that you wish to perform an act that will ultimately commit your soul into the depths of the underworld. For a moment of happiness, you are willing to condemn yourself to an eternity of damnation.
1�Hmph... Little do I know of these emotions that drive your heart to the brink of insanity, but little do I care.
1�I shall help you, but only because the darkness that dwells inside me resonates with the beast that has a grip on your feeble mind.
1�Remember, I cannot guarantee that the result of our undertakings shall match the outcome you envision.
1�But there is nothing you need to worry of...yet.
1�What I need of you now, is the procurement of an item necessary for the ceremony of rebirth.

1�There is a certain type of reed that grows near the rivers and swamps of Tavnazia. When certain natural conditions are met, this reed decays into a hard substance that resembles a type of incense. Though quite rare, without one of these reeds, I will be unable to call forth the essence of your loved one's being.
1�And again, I must warn you that nothing is certain when dealing with souls that have once crossed over into the nethers.
1�You must be prepared to compensate for your actions.
1�Though ultimately you will end up paying more than you receive. But you already know this, do you not?
1�When you have obtained the item, travel to the base of the Cascade Edellaine.
1�I shall be waiting for you there.
1�Are y-you the great n-necromancer of whom the people whisper?
1�Enaremand.Wh-what exactly do you m-m-m-mean...?
1�I... You... B-but...Oh, thank you!
1�R-reeds? R-rivers? S-swamps?That sounds like Lufa...no, Misareaux. Yes, Misareaux...
1�I will return to the s-safehold and prepare for the ceremony.
1�When you find the reed, t-take it directly to the waterfall... Yes, g-go there at once. I will m-m-m-meet you beneath it.
1�Before you lies a survival guide penned by the Servicemen's Mutual Aid Network. It touches on such topics as teleportation and battle records.
1�Before you lies a survival guide penned by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network. It touches on such topics as teleportation and battle records.
